document_data.name: Qadib
document_data.caption: A map showing Qadib east of the Genie's Turban.
document_data.aliases: City of Wands, City of Sages
document_data.mainbody: The [[Free Cities of Zakhara|Free City]] of '''Qadib''', also known as the '''City of Wands''', was located along  [[Al-Haul River]]. Qadib housed more [[wizard|magic users]] than any other place in northern [[Zakhara]], topped only by [[Huzuz]] and [[Rog'osto]] in all the [[Land of Fate]].
document_data.Trade: The city was also known for its universities, which earned it the second title "'''City of Sages'''", and the fabrication of [[Uther]], a yellow-orange [[dye]].
